title: Kalahae-curse: Julian and the warlocks Book-1
description: Julian and her friends enter a haunted house in the name of adventure where they meet a powerful warlock, Micavelious. Micavelious is cursed with Kalahae-curse that is slowly killing him. Magnus is Micavelious's brother who is ruthless and lacks empathy when it comes to witches. The woman he loved was murdered by an unknown person. Magnus has been told by a seer that the witch who dies unjustly will be reborn. Magnus has been waiting for her return for centuries.Sandy is a witch who left her family behind but now with new dangers afoot, she has no other choise but to return back but will the coven accept her back?
author: Ramla Virgo
